Title: Additional hosts of Podosphaera xanthii from Thailand
Abstract:
Additional records of P. xanthii new to Thailand were
described on the hosts Macroptilium lathyroides (Fabaceae), Hibiscus
esculentus (Malvaceae), Persicaria attenuata subsp. pulchra
(Polygonaceae), Solanum xanthocarpum (Solanaceae) and Boehmeria diffusa
(Urticaceae). Persicaria attenuate subsp. pulchra is a new host record
for Podosphaera in the world.
